name: Eye of Newt
description:
You are merely the humble eye of a deceased newt, but you've been given new life for one singular purpose:  reaching the cauldron of a hungry witch making her dinner. 

You MUST reach that cauldron.  It's the one thing you want.  Your only dream, your only goal, your only desire.

Made in 48 hours for NM Game Jam 2020!

Controls

Movement - WASD
Free Look - Mouse
Jump - Spacebar
Respawn - R
